name: LearnTimesTables
0:
”Alexa, open Times Tables”
”Learn the six times table”
”Test me on the nine times table”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: times tables
des: This skill can help you and your family learn their times tables. It can start by saying out loud a times table. And then it can teach the times table by having your child complete each line of the times table. Finally, it can test your family members and help with the ones they get wrong. It can certainly help them practice on those frantic mornings before school!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
